description: Try our easy to follow Classic White Christmas Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Slice,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,White Christmas,Egg free,Halal,Microwave,Christmas,Wheat free,Vegetarian
name: Classic White Christmas Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease and line a 20x30cm slice pan with baking paper.
In a small saucepan combine condensed milk, vegetable shortening solid cooking block and half of the white chocolate. Stir over low heat until melted and smooth.

In a large bowl combine puffed rice cereal, coconut, 3/4 cup of cranberries and pistachios. Add the melted chocolate mixture and mix well. Spoon mixture into pan and spread evenly over the base. Refrigerate 30 minutes.

Place remaining white chocolate in a small heatproof bowl. Microwave in 30 second bursts, stirring between each, until melted and smooth. Drizzle melted chocolate over slice. Sprinkle with remaining cranberries. Refrigerate 30 minutes, until set.
Cut into small 4cm square pieces to serve. Store in an airtight container in refrigerator for up to 1 week.
